channel.title: diacritics on Sebastian Korotkiewicz - Tech{{log}}
channel.description: Recent content in diacritics on Sebastian Korotkiewicz - Tech{{log}}

item.title: Remove all of the diacritics from a file
item.description: I like iconv as it handles all accents variations : cat non-ascii.txt | iconv -f utf8 -t ascii//TRANSLIT//IGNORE > ascii.txt
